about_the_game:
Dungeon Slasher is a side-scrolling roguelike game that combines retro graphics with the fun of picking a combination of character, artifact, and skill to bring down the dungeon, allowing for dozens of unique playthroughs.

◉ ABOUT THE GAME ◉



▶ Side-scrolling roguelike fun!
Combine characters, skills, and artifacts as you wish! Depending on what combinations and development paths players select, methods required for conquering the dungeon will change.

▶A variety of modes to play through!
From the classic 'Normal Mode,' where players take down dungeons one at a time, to the 'Super Fast Mode,' which focuses on progress and boss attacks, and 'Challenge Mode,' which will ramp up the difficulty for more challenge, there are tons of modes for players to conquer and enjoy.

▶2D pixel graphic action fun!
This game is jam-packed full of characters and bosses rendered in high-quality pixel graphics! In addition to the colorful retro pixel action, players can pick from a number of skins to highlight each character's unique personality!

▶A variety of playable characters!
According to which combination of character and weapon players chose, the gameplay experience and movement will differ wildly! Experience all sorts of new gimmicks and gameplay for yourself!

※ Regarding gameplay upload and streaming
Any individual or company may stream or upload videos of this game as long as the copyright information and store URLs are included within the video description or the video itself. We would appreciate creators leaving out spoilers of the ending whenever possible.

©2024 96Percent All rights reserved. Published by CFK.

▶ Side-scrolling roguelike fun!
Combine characters, skills, and artifacts as you wish! Depending on what combinations and development paths players select, methods required for conquering the dungeon will change.

From the classic 'Normal Mode,' where players take down dungeons one at a time, to the 'Super Fast Mode,' which focuses on progress and boss attacks, and 'Challenge Mode,' which will ramp up the difficulty for more challenge, there are tons of modes for players to conquer and enjoy.

▶2D pixel graphic action fun!

name: DUNGEON SLASHER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 (SP1) / Windows® 8 / Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel® Core™ i5-750 or 3.2 GHz AMD Phenom™ II X4 955
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD5850 (1 GB VRAM)
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: 3.3 GHz Intel® Core™ i5-6600 or 4.0 GHz AMD FX-8350 or better
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon HD 7970 or better (2 GB VRAM)
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device

short_description: Navigate maps filled with enemies, destroying all who get in your way! Use a variety of character, artifact, and skill synergies to defeat the dungeon!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
